title: [HBA] Vietnam B2B Matching Project
summary: Most Web2 firms in Vietnam are only at the awareness stage. This project acts as a key bridge, helping Web2 businesses understand and connect with practical Web3 applications.
solution: Conduct a large-scale survey on Web3 adoption among HCMC businesses and host a conference for Web2–Web3 companies to meet, network, and explore collaboration.
proposer_name: Ho Chi Minh City Blockchain Association
proposer_relevant_experience:
# **Research Lead: PhD\. Nguyen Quoc Huy**
LinkedIn: [https://www\.linkedin\.com/in/nguyen\-quoc\-huy\-b6195581/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/nguyen-quoc-huy-b6195581/)

**Responsibilities:**

• Design and implement the survey methodology, including questionnaire development and sampling approach.

• Conduct data collection across selected target groups through online and offline channels.

• Analyze survey results to identify key trends, insights, challenges, and opportunities.

• Develop a comprehensive report with findings, conclusions, and actionable recommendations.

**Qualifications:**

• 50+ international research papers with 10 published just this year.

• Japan Advanced Institute of Science and Technology.

# **Tran Xuan Tien \- Secretary of HCMC Blockchain Association**
Role: Project Manager

**Responsibilities:**

• Ensure all events are executed smoothly across both communications and operations.

• Coordinate with media partners, internal teams, and external stakeholders to deliver event outcomes.

• Manage timelines, logistics, and on-site execution to maintain event quality and consistency.

• Oversee post-event reporting, communication deliverables, and continuous improvement processes.

**Qualifications:**

• 10 years of experience in Communications and Government Relations.

• PR background in leading technology companies across both Web2 and Web3 sectors.



# Cardano Vietnam will partner with HBA
**About Cardano Vietnam**

- Cardano Vietnam is a long-standing, sustainable community dedicated to education, technical training, builder development, and the expansion of the Cardano ecosystem in Vietnam. Led by Cardano Ambassadors, the community has built an extensive network across universities, technology clubs, Web3 startups, and domestic blockchain partners.

- As an event partner and a collaborator in applying Cardano Blockchain technology, Cardano Vietnam will take on the following roles:

- Developer onboarding and practical training: wallet creation, testnet interaction, transaction execution, introductions to Plutus and Hydra, and setting up development environments.

- Ecosystem education: governance, Project Catalyst, treasury mechanisms, and funding opportunities for startups and emerging project teams.

- Enterprise advisory: supporting traditional businesses and startups in adopting Cardano Blockchain solutions.

- Content development and localization: producing high-quality Vietnamese materials for students, developers, founders, and ADA holders.

- Event and community media support: promoting activities, amplifying communication across social channels, and engaging participants.

- Collaboration with universities, developer communities, and Web3 partners to help Cardano reach broader user groups across Vietnam.

With a strong network and consistent training and communication efforts, Cardano Vietnam plays a critical role in attracting new builders and supporting businesses in adopting Cardano technology.

sub_fields.title: Who you’re targeting, how you’ll reach them, and why this matters for Cardano?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
We aim to target both Web2 and Web3 businesses.



HBA is the official blockchain organization in Ho Chi Minh City and the most suitable entity to lead these initiatives.

Through its partnership with the Institute of Copyright Technology and Digital Assets, HBA will directly engage leading business associations and Web2 enterprises such as VCCI, HUBA, and YBA. At the same time, HBA will leverage its extensive network within the Web3 ecosystem to reach relevant projects and communities.



Given the importance and expected impact of this project, Cardano will be positioned as the Diamond Sponsor. This provides Cardano with not only prominent and official mainstream media exposure, but also direct access to key businesses and government agencies in Ho Chi Minh City.

sub_fields.title: Provide a list of key activities of your project:
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
- A press conference to announce the survey, together with relevant government agencies and business associations.

- Collect and conduct interviews with Web2 and Web3 businesses.

- Analyze the collected data and develop a comprehensive report on the state of blockchain adoption among businesses in Ho Chi Minh City.

- A conference to present the survey findings, inviting government agencies and business representatives, including both keynote sessions and panel discussions.

- A private dinner to facilitate networking between Web2 and Web3 businesses.

- Related media and communication activities.

sub_fields.title: What are your success metrics?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
- 500+ Web2 businesses participating in the report.

- Major business associations and government agencies partnering in the report.

- 10+ media articles covering the report.

- 200+ VIP guests attending the survey launch event.

- 50 VIP+ guests attending the private dinner

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
# **Problem perception**
- Vietnam is one of the leading countries in the world in terms of crypto adoption. However, the practical application of blockchain technology in real business use cases remains underdeveloped.
- Although the Prime Minister introduced the N**ational Blockchain Strategy in 2024**, setting the ambition for Vietnam to become a regional hub for blockchain innovation and a home for leading blockchain enterprises, most businesses have not yet reached the expected level of adoption.
- Blockchain has already demonstrated clear benefits in optimizing operations, improving efficiency, and increasing revenue. However, bringing blockchain closer to businesses requires practical and well-structured initiatives that can bridge the gap between strategic vision and real implementation.
- Ho Chi Minh City alone has more than **100,000 Web2 businesses**, yet the connection to blockchain solutions remains largely untapped. This project will serve as a strategic bridge to link Web2 enterprises with Web3 innovations.
- **For Cardano**, the entire program provides continuous sponsor-level visibility, **ensuring prominent presence** and the highest level of access to Web2 businesses throughout all activities and events.

# Our approach


- Before developing any evaluation or solution plan, we first need a comprehensive report on the current state of Vietnamese businesses, including their attitudes, plans, assessments, and level of understanding regarding blockchain technology.

- Once this overall landscape is established, HBA will take the lead as a connector to drive blockchain adoption among businesses in Ho Chi Minh City through communication initiatives and targeted events.

- The first step is a survey launch conference that creates a space for both Web2 and Web3 communities to come together and discuss how blockchain can be applied in a business environment. This will be followed by a private dinner to facilitate meaningful networking between the two groups.

# Target engagement


Web2 businesses in Ho Chi Minh City

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
# **Legitimacy**
HBA is the official and government-recognized blockchain organization in Ho Chi Minh City. All of HBA’s activities are conducted under this formal mandate. Therefore, participation in these initiatives elevates the credibility and positioning of Cardano within the local ecosystem.

# **Media Impact**
HBA’s activities consistently generate strong mainstream media coverage, something Cardano has not fully leveraged in Vietnam in recent years. Through this project, Cardano will gain official, high-visibility exposure across major press channels.

# **Ecosystem Expansion**
The survey and related events will create significant opportunities for blockchain adoption between Web2 and Web3 businesses. This also opens the door for Cardano to expand its ecosystem and build strategic partnerships with key organizations and enterprises in Vietnam.

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
- HBA is the official blockchain organization with the sole mission of promoting blockchain adoption in Ho Chi Minh City.
- Our partners for conducting this survey include both government and non-government organizations such as the Ho Chi Minh City Digital - Transformation Center (DXC), the Vietnam Chamber of Commerce and Industry (VCCI), the Ho Chi Minh City Union of Business Associations (HUBA), and the Young Businesspeople Association of Ho Chi Minh City (YBA).
- We are also collaborating with the Institute of Copyright Technology and Digital Assets to execute this survey.

# **Team capabilities**
- The research team belongs to the Institute of Copyright Technology and Digital Assets and includes Associate Professors with extensive experience in technology-related research projects.
- The event organizer has a proven track record of delivering large-scale conferences, including Conviction, the number one blockchain conference in Vietnam, which attracted more than 30,000 attendees.

# **Previous work**
- Conviction: the largest crypto and AI event in Vietnam in 2024, attracting more than 30,000 attendees.
- Unitour Series: a high-quality educational roadshow hosted across major universities, designed to provide students with advanced knowledge in blockchain and emerging technologies.

sub_fields.title: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.description: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.answer:
- Due to current market conditions, we propose using an ADA reference price of **$0\.40** to ensure project feasibility.
- The estimated total budget required for this project is** $53,000**, equivalent to** 133,000 ADA**. We are seeking **60,000 ADA** in funding support from Cardano. In return, Cardano will receive all the benefits outlined above as the Diamond Sponsor of the program.
- The remaining budget will be sourced through additional socialized funding to ensure full execution of the event.
- Below is the detailed projected expenditure report: [https://docs\.google\.com/spreadsheets/d/1VM\_TXJcBI\_DhrB0bmd76SgVtgdIwfZHKAGrd5a9VRcI/edit?usp=sharing](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1VM_TXJcBI_DhrB0bmd76SgVtgdIwfZHKAGrd5a9VRcI/edit?usp=sharing)

MILESTONE 1 (ADA 14,000 – 10%):

Kick-off announcement

• Press kit production, media booking, and PR distribution fees:  14,000 ADA.

Milestone 1 Total: 14,000

MILESTONE 2 (ADA 18,000 – 40%):

Survey and Report

• Survey design, questionnaire development, and methodology planning: 2,200 ADA.

• Data collection costs, including distribution channels, fieldwork, and respondent incentives: 4,500 ADA.

• Data cleaning, processing, and analytical work: 4,500 ADA.

• Report writing, visualization, and design/formatting: 4,500 ADA.

• Publication, printing,: 2,200 ADA.

Milestone 2 Total: ADA 18,000

MILESTONE 3 (ADA 96,000 – 40%):

Conference and Private Dinner

• Venue rental, staging, audio-visual setup, and event logistics for the conference: 27,000 ADA.

• Press kit production, media booking, and PR distribution fees: 54,000 ADA

• Speaker and guest coordination costs (honorarium, travel support if required): 2,700 ADA.

• Private dinner expenses including menu, beverages, table setup, and service charges: 11,600 ADA.



Milestone 3 Total: ADA 96,000

MILESTONE 4 (ADA 1,800 - 10%)

Wrap up

- Edit video and report: 1,800 ADA.

sub_fields.answer:
# **Legitimacy**
HBA is the official and government-recognized blockchain organization in Ho Chi Minh City. All of HBA’s activities are conducted under this formal mandate. Therefore, participation in these initiatives elevates the credibility and positioning of Cardano within the local ecosystem.

# **Media Impact**
HBA’s activities consistently generate strong mainstream media coverage, something Cardano has not fully leveraged in Vietnam in recent years. Through this project, Cardano will gain official, high-visibility exposure across major press channels.

# **Ecosystem Expansion**
The survey and related events will create significant opportunities for blockchain adoption between Web2 and Web3 businesses. This also opens the door for Cardano to expand its ecosystem and build strategic partnerships with key organizations and enterprises in Vietnam.
